projects.title: JVE Capital Investments
projects.description: A polished corporate website focused on clarity, accessibility, and trust. Clean typography, responsive layout, and performance optimization for a professional experience.
projects.shortDescription: JVE Capital Investments, Commercial, Residential, & Restoration.

projects.title: Skinstric AI
projects.description: An AI-powered skincare analysis platform that provides personalized skincare recommendations. Uses machine learning to analyze skin conditions and suggest appropriate treatments and products.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: A fully functional Netflix clone built with modern web technologies. Features user authentication, movie browsing, search functionality, and responsive design that mimics the original Netflix interface.

projects.title: Ultraverse NFT World
projects.description: A cutting-edge NFT marketplace and virtual world platform that combines blockchain technology with immersive 3D experiences. Features NFT trading, virtual galleries, and interactive metaverse environments.
projects.shortDescription: NFT marketplace and virtual world platform

projects.title: Summarist Audio Library
projects.description: A full-stack audio library featuring Next.js, TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS for responsive, fast-loading performance.
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack audio library with responsive UI

projects.title: Movie Entertainment
projects.description: A dynamic movie discovery platform with advanced filtering, ratings, and personalized recommendations. Features a sleek interface for browsing and discovering new films.

projects.title: E-Commerce Book Library
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform for book lovers featuring advanced search, user reviews, and secure payment processing.

projects.title: Ori Company
projects.description: A professional corporate website showcasing business services and company portfolio. Features modern design, responsive layout, and integrated contact management system.

projects.title: Creations X Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive creative platform showcasing innovative digital solutions and design services.
